QuestData.Title: That's Not My Fetish
QuestData.Description:
<The glassy eyes of the pig fetish seem to follow you as you approach. The dark power emanating from the witch's fetish must be what is keeping the workers transformed.
Perhaps Thomas Staughton might have some idea what to do with it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Pig Fetish to Thomas Staughton.
QuestData.RewardText: Removing it didn't break the curse? Damn. We'll have to try something else.
